channel.title: Custom items go to Wield instead of wear
channel.description:
My custom items always go to my weapon slot. No matter what!
I went into items.java and added them to the proper spots. EX: public static int capes[] = { 14139,
I know how to add them to the items.java i even went into the client files and chaged it from "weild" to "Wear". I tried everything i could think off. WHY IS THIS NOT WORKING!!! UGHHHGHGHGHGHHHHH!

item.title: Custom items go to Wield instead of wear
